name: Ex-Roger and the Last Treasure
description:
Ex-Roger and the Last Treasure 

Ex-Roger and the Last Treasure is a third-person adventure game that takes place in a dystopian future.

Travel through post-modern Mayan ruins and collect what is known to be the last human race's treasure.

Play the role of Ex-Roger, a space treasure hunter with magic powers, who will have to fight enemies and overcome laser traps to reach his goal and escape the planet.

Project delivered as university's final year project
